name: Rough Diamond (nay)
description:
Rough Diamond is a top-down endless action pinball-like arcade game. You play as a reluctant batter who works for a very real and official coal company - only the finest and toughest coal is acceptable. Problem is the coal's being shot at you.

At least you get to keep any diamonds you make from it...right?

Aim of the game is to deflect oncoming coal balls back at the pitcher like dispensers, the more you hit them the more powerful (and dangerous) they become. 

Clear as many waves as possible by destroying the Pitchers!
Just try not to get caught in the crossfire of your own attack...
Controller is highly recommended to play!
